# Opening

## What is Money?

- Today’s goal: distinguish **medium of exchange**, **unit of account**, and **store of value**.
- We will use historical examples to motivate why modern monetary systems look the way they do.

<script>
function checkMcq(containerId){
  const box = document.getElementById(containerId);
  const correct = box.getAttribute("data-correct");

  const out = box.querySelector(".mcq-output");
  if(!picked){ out.textContent = "Please select an option."; return; }
  if(picked.value === correct){
    out.textContent = "Correct.";
    out.style.fontWeight = "600";
  } else {
    out.textContent = "Not quite. Try again (hint below).";
    out.style.fontWeight = "600";
  }
}
</script>
